docTitle.titlePart:
Integrable hierarchies related to the Kuper-CH
spectral problem

byline.affiliation: 1 School of Mathematical Science, University of Science and Technology of China,

front.address:
Chuzhou, 239012 Anhui,
People's Republic of China

byline.affiliation: 3 Wu Wen-Tsun Key Laboratory of Mathematics, USTC, Chinese Academy of Sciences

front.note: (Received 11 April 2011; accepted 31 May 2011; published online 5 July 2011)
front.div:
In this paper, from a given Kuper-CH spectral problem, we propose two kinds of
super integrable hierarchies. One is the Kuper-CH hierarchy, the other is the gen-
eralized Kuper-Harry-Dym hierarchy. Moreover, we construct their zero curvature
representations and super-bi-Hamiltonian structures.
